professional_summary: Highly accomplished Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and distributed systems. Expertise in React, Node.js, Python, and cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP). Led cross-functional teams of 5-12 engineers and delivered products serving 2M+ users. Passionate about clean code, system design, and mentoring junior developers.

work_experience.description: Architected and developed a real-time analytics dashboard using React, Node.js, and WebSockets. Led migration from monolithic architecture to microservices. Mentored team of 6 junior engineers through code reviews, pair programming, and bi-weekly technical workshops. Implemented CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and Docker. Collaborated with Product and Design teams using Agile/Scrum methodology (2-week sprints).
key_responsibilities: Architected and developed a real-time analytics dashboard using React, Node.js, and WebSockets
Led migration from monolithic architecture to microservices
Mentored team of 6 junior engineers through code reviews, pair programming, and bi-weekly technical workshops
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and Docker
Collaborated with Product and Design teams using Agile/Scrum methodology (2-week sprints)

work_experience.description: Developed RESTful APIs handling 1.5M requests/day. Built automated testing framework. Optimized database queries reducing load times across core application features.

Engineered customer-facing SaaS platform from ground up serving B2B clients in fintech sector. Integrated third-party APIs (Stripe, Plaid, SendGrid) for payment processing and communications. Implemented OAuth 2.0 authentication and role-based access control (RBAC) system. Reduced infrastructure costs by 40% through AWS resource optimization and auto-scaling implementation.

work_experience.description: Developed responsive web interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript for e-commerce platform. Fixed 100+ bugs and implemented 25+ features based on user feedback and analytics. Participated in daily standups and sprint planning meetings.

projects.description: Open-source real-time collaboration tool for developers with 2.3K+ GitHub stars. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and MongoDB.

projects.description: Personal finance mobile app using React Native and Firebase. Features: AI-powered expense categorization, receipt scanning (OCR), budget alerts.
